meanings.definition: To appear again after a period of absence or inactivity.
meanings.sent1: After being away for a long time, the old memories resurfaced.
meanings.sent2: The sun resurfaced after hiding behind the clouds.
meanings.sent3: When the forgotten toy resurfaced, it brought back happy memories.
meanings.sent4: Her buried talent resurfaced like a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The truth always finds a way to resurface, no matter how deep it is buried.

meanings.definition: To cover with a new surface.
meanings.sent1: The workers resurfaced the road to make it smoother.
meanings.sent2: She decided to resurface the table with a fresh coat of paint.
meanings.sent3: The chef resurfaced the cake with a layer of frosting.
meanings.sent4: The artist resurfaced the canvas with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The driveway will look brand new once we resurface it with asphalt.

meanings.definition: To come to the surface again.
meanings.sent1: The bubbles resurfaced in the fizzy drink.
meanings.sent2: The submarine slowly resurfaced after exploring the depths.
meanings.sent3: The fish resurfaced to catch a glimpse of the passing boat.
meanings.sent4: The memories resurfaced in her mind like bubbles in water.
meanings.sent5: The sunken ship resurfaced after years underwater, revealing its secrets.
